patterns: Where can I camp near West Yellowstone?
Tell me about Big Springs Campground (Forest Service).
Is Big Springs Campground (Forest Service) good for families or tents?
What wildlife is around Big Springs Campground (Forest Service)?
When is Big Springs Campground (Forest Service) open for camping?
response: Try **Big Springs Campground (Forest Service)** – Near the famous Big Springs headwaters Located: Near Macks Inn, Island Park, ID (~35 min). Open: Open June through mid-September. Bear Safety: Carry bear spray; food must be stored in vehicles or boxes.

response: Try **Sawtelle Mountain Resort RV Park** – Full-service RV resort with spacious pull-throughs Located: Island Park, ID (~30 miles southwest). Open: Open all year. Bear Safety: Urban-edge campground; bear encounters rare but bear spray still recommended.

response: Try **Buttermilk Campground** – Great for peace and solitude in the trees Located: Gallatin National Forest, ~35 minutes north of West Yellowstone. Open: Open late June through September. Bear Safety: Must carry bear spray; strict food storage is enforced.

Is Buffalo Run Campground good for families or tents?
What wildlife is around Buffalo Run Campground?
When is Buffalo Run Campground open for camping?
response: Try **Buffalo Run Campground** – RV and tent sites tucked in the forest Located: Near Madison Arm, ~25 minutes NW of West Yellowstone. Open: Open June through September. Bear Safety: Bear spray and food safety essential. Report sightings to camp host.

Is Sheep Creek Campground good for families or tents?
What wildlife is around Sheep Creek Campground?
When is Sheep Creek Campground open for camping?
response: Try **Sheep Creek Campground** – Quiet campground in a spruce-fir forest Located: Targhee National Forest, ~40 minutes southwest of West Yellowstone. Open: Open June through mid-September. Bear Safety: Bear spray required; use bear boxes and follow all storage rules.

Is Rainbow Point Campground good for families or tents?
What wildlife is around Rainbow Point Campground?
When is Rainbow Point Campground open for camping?
response: Try **Rainbow Point Campground** – Lakeside sites with views of the mountains Located: North shore of Hebgen Lake, ~20 minutes from West Yellowstone. Open: Open late May to mid-September. Bear Safety: Bear spray encouraged; food lockers provided.

Is Targhee Creek Trailhead Camping Area good for families or tents?
What wildlife is around Targhee Creek Trailhead Camping Area?
When is Targhee Creek Trailhead Camping Area open for camping?
response: Try **Targhee Creek Trailhead Camping Area** – Primitive camping with access to alpine trails Located: Near Targhee Pass on US-20, ~20 miles southwest of West Yellowstone. Open: Open July to mid-September (snow melt dependent). Bear Safety: Very remote—bear spray mandatory. Practice Leave No Trace.
